summary: An FBI Threat Intake Examiner forwards a report from a 36-year-old woman who alleges she was a victim of Jeffrey Epstein at ages 16-17. She describes being taken to Florida by her aunt, encounters with Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, and ongoing fear for her safety. The report is forwarded to the Miami Field Office for potential action.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Allegedly sexually assaulted the caller when she was 16-17 years old in Florida and was present during a transaction at an apartment.

persons.name: Gillian Maxwell
persons.context: Reported by the caller to have been present at an apartment where a transaction and assault occurred.

connections.description: Both are mentioned by the caller as being present during an alleged assault at an apartment.

events.title: Alleged Florida Assault by Epstein
events.description: The caller, at age 16-17, was taken to Florida by her aunt. Epstein came to her hotel room and, after being initially denied entry, gained access and assaulted her on multiple occasions.

events.title: Apartment Transaction and Assault
events.description: The caller was brought to an apartment by another girl. A transaction occurred, drugs were given, and Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell were present. The caller states 'they hurt' her that day.

events.title: FBI Threat Intake Report
events.description: A 36-year-old female caller contacts the FBI NTOC to report her historical victimization by Jeffrey Epstein and her deceased aunt's involvement in human trafficking.

keyFacts: A 36-year-old woman reported to the FBI that she was a victim of Jeffrey Epstein at ages 16-17.
She alleges Epstein assaulted her in a Florida hotel room on multiple occasions after her aunt (who trafficked people) left her alone.
She reports a separate incident at an apartment where Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell were present, drugs were involved, and she was hurt.
The caller expresses fear for her son's life and her own safety due to threats from 'bad people' associated with Epstein.
This is reported as the caller's first time providing this information to the FBI.
